deploy.startCommand: echo 'PORT is set to: $PORT' && [ -z "$PORT" ] && echo 'PORT not set, defaulting to 8000' && export PORT=8000 || true && python manage.py migrate --noinput && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && gunicorn ecom.ecom.wsgi:application --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --workers 3 --timeout 90 --log-level debug
